content: don t mess with this tooth fairy more loveable than the one in teen titans go i promise perhaps this could be useful for persuading little ones to take better care of their teeth dental health is important and if those baby teeth aren t coming out the tooth fairy ain t making rent the yarn suggested for the wings tizz 8ply is acrylic with a polyester glitter thread twisted in and is a spotlight homebrand yarn which is why it doesn t show up on ravelry you could substitute with regular 8ply yarn or variegated yarn to spice things up
